headline: Cognizant Schedules Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH), a leading provider of information technology, consulting, and business process services, will announce results for the second quarter of 2025 on Wednesday, July 30, 2025 after market close.
